QuestData.Title: Ravager Egg Roundup
QuestData.Description: I'm starving!$B$BThere's irony in that, wouldn't you say? A starving cook?$B$B<Legassi laughs half-heartedly and taps a folded piece of parchment he has in his pocket.>$B$BAccording to this tourist map we were following - before we were so rudely shot down - there's an area to the southwest, near Terokkar Forest. It's called the Razorthorn Trail, and supposedly it's brimming with delicious ravager eggs!$B$BI could cook up quite a feast if only someone were brave enough to go down there and get me some!
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve 12 Ravager Eggs for Legassi at the Zeppelin Crash in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have those eggs yet?$B$B<Legassi's stomach grumbles in anticipation.>
QuestData.RewardText: In order to have great cuisine, you need to have great ingredients. And these eggs look great!$B$BI've just finished cleaning off my frying pan, so you're more than welcome to join me for a meal!
